definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: lie, be a liar (Ar. kad-aba; Aram. [[כְּדַב]], kdab id. chiefly Pa.; NH [[כָּזַב]])—

definitions.title: Niph.
definitions.body: Pf. 3 fs. [[תּׂחַלְתּוֹ נִכְזׇ֑בָה]] Job 41:1 his hope has been made deceptive, i.e. been shewn to be so; 2 ms. consec. [[וְנִכְזׇ֑בְתָּ]] Pr 30:6 lest he convict thee and thou be proven a liar.

definitions.title: Pi.
definitions.body: Pf. 3 ms. [[כִּזֵּב]] Mic 2:11; Impf. 3 ms. [[יְכַזֵּב]] Hb Hab 2:3, Pr 14:5; [[וִיכַזֵּב]] Nu 23:19, etc.; Inf. cstr. sf. [[כַזֶּבְכֶם]] ([[בְּ]]) Ez Eze 13:19; —

lie, tell a lie, abs., Nu 23:19 (JE), Mic 2:11, Job 6:28, Job 34:6, Pr 14:5, Is 57:11; sq. [[לְ]] pers. lie to Ez Eze 13:9, Ps 78:36, Ps 89:36; sq. [[בְּ]] pers. tell a lie with, i.e. in intercourse, conversation with 2Ki 4:16.
disappoint, fail, of a divine revelation Hb Hab 2:3; waters of a spring Is 58:11.

definitions.title: Hiph.
definitions.body: Impf. 3 ms. sf. [[יַכְזִיבֵנִי]] Job 24:25 who will make me a liar? i.e. prove me to be so (cf.
